resources.string: Check latest guidelines on COVID-19 by WHO\nall info here
Please restart the app to install
Dashboard will show the latest information.
Locate stores,upload needy photos so that others could help.
With Post Issues feature you can post issues faced by you or others.
With Appolo Risk Scan Chatbot you can predict your heath conditions based on symptoms.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

Sahaayak-We have developed a platform which connects the service provider (can be a single individual or a NGO) with someone in need.Where the needy can get help from his locality or from a NGO.
# A user can be a “service provider” or can be a “help seeker” depending on time and situation, it has nothing to do with the financial condition of the user every time.
